arm.name: arm
arm.transformationDescription:
Within a short time, the skin around [npc.her] arms started to darken and feel loose [npc.she] looks down at her hands and see sharp nails piercing threw the tips of [npc.her] fingers as well as [npc.her] two middle fingers fusing together. Simultaneously small holes in [npc.her] skin started to open up revealing [npc.armFullDescription] which when touched feels coarse like gravel.
As the final pieces of skin fall off, [npc.nameIsFull] left with four fingered, [style.boldDog(mountain snapper arms and hands)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription].
arm.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] [npc.armRows] arms, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription(true)]. [npc.Her] hands have formed into four fingered, mountain snapper hands, complete with sharp claws and tough, leathery palms.
